definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to permeate/to percolate/fig. to saturate (with emotion)
to be contaminated/to be gradually influenced
to soak seeds (to make them germinate)

sentences.english: Thoroughly rinse the turkey, and discard the brine mixture.
sentences.chinese: 倒掉浸火鸡的盐水，稍微冲洗一下火鸡。

sentences.english: The second step was in the house of Cornelius, when the Gentile believers were baptized in the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 第二步是在哥尼流家里，把外邦的信徒浸在圣灵里。

sentences.english: The enrichment and recovery of tantalum and niobium through acid leaching and sodium alkali fusing from tungsten residue is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸与钠碱熔融法从钨渣中富集和回收钽铌。

sentences.english: He takes the cross and dips it in the hole.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着十字架，在冰窟窿里浸一浸。

sentences.english: Trap outlet pipe should not be immersed in water.
sentences.chinese: 疏水阀的出水管不应浸在水里。

sentences.english: Rose:You mean that I have to put half of my body in the dirty flood water?
sentences.chinese: 你是说我需要把下半生浸在这样的脏水里？

sentences.english: Immerse the cloth in the dye for twenty minutes.
Will I have the opportunity to study abroad?
sentences.chinese: 我有没有到外国大学浸濡学习的机会？

sentences.english: Add some salt in water, soak the cherry for 1 minute.
sentences.chinese: 将少许盐放入清水中，浸樱桃一分钟。

sentences.english: The victim was then partially immersed in the liquid and fried to death.
sentences.chinese: 受刑人会部分被浸在液体中被煎炸而死。

sentences.english: Take out chilled soybean curd from fridge. Soak in cold water for 5 minutes until thaw.
sentences.chinese: 由冰箱取出冻豆腐，浸冷水中约5分钟至完全解冻。

sentences.english: The technical specification of dipping paint is given.
sentences.chinese: 列举了浸涂漆的技术指标。

sentences.english: Technology survey and development tendency investigation on tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction;
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸与钠碱熔融法从钨渣中富集和回收钽铌。

sentences.english: Shallow-scald shelled fresh shrimps with boiling water until just cooked, take out and place in a soup bowl.
sentences.chinese: 以沸水略浸烫虾仁至仅熟，取出盛放在汤碗内。

sentences.english: A dip phosphating process for hairpins was forwarded.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一室多用发夹浸磷磷化工艺。
将肉在腌汁里浸一整夜。

definition: puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
to smoke/to fumigate/to assail the nostrils/to perfume
fragrance/warm/to educate/variant of 熏[xun1]/to smoke/to fumigate
